sentences.en: A cylindrical bore provides direct mounting onto the shaft.
sentences.cn: 圆柱孔提供直接安装到矿井.

sentences.en: A sector of a cylindrical capacitor may thus be utilized as an energy filter.
sentences.cn: 柱面扇形电容器可作为能量过滤器.

sentences.en: Attachment systems can sometimes be heavier for a spherical motor than for a cylindrical one.
sentences.cn: 球形发动机的连接系统有时要比圆柱形发动机的重些.

sentences.en: Bearing rings and washers cylindrical surface to the radial guide cage.
sentences.cn: 轴承套圈和垫圈的圆柱形表面,用以在径向引导保持架.

sentences.en: Extensive use has been made of this technique to generate cylindrical light waves.
sentences.cn: 这个产生柱面光波的方法已被广泛采用.

sentences.en: In Section 6 . 11 the cylindrical cavity problem is discussed.
sentences.cn: 在第6.11节中节中,将讨论柱形空腔问题.

sentences.en: The " pony " type of mixer is also a steel fabricated cylindrical tank and plain internally.
sentences.cn: “ 小筒 ” 型和膏机也是一种钢制的圆形的同筒形槽而内部是平的.

sentences.en: The detector is housed in a streamlined cylindrical container.
sentences.cn: 探测器安装在流线型圆柱形容器内.

sentences.en: The stone was pecked and ground into cylindrical pestles.
sentences.cn: 石头被凿开并被磨成一根根圆形的杵.

sentences.en: The weevil is a shiny, cylindrical beetle.
sentences.cn: 象甲科害虫是一种发光的圆柱形甲虫.
这个仪器舱是个圆柱体.

words.tran_cn: 圆筒；汽缸；[数] 柱面；圆柱状物

phrases.tran_cn: 圆柱滚子；（输送机）圆筒形滚柱
圆柱滚子轴承；圆筒形滚柱轴承
n. 圆桶槽；圆筒形储罐

trans.tran_cn: 圆柱形的，圆筒状的，气缸（或滚筒）的，圆筒形
trans.tran_en: in the shape of a cylinder
